thread.title: UP CM Yogi Adityanath and Union Minister Promote Natural Farming in Lucknow | Headlines
thread.title_full: UP CM Yogi Adityanath and Union Minister Promote Natural Farming in Lucknow | Headlines

author: Devdiscourse News Desk
title: UP CM Yogi Adityanath and Union Minister Promote Natural Farming in Lucknow | Headlines
text: UP CM Yogi Adityanath and Union Minister Promote Natural Farming in Lucknow Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath and Union Minister Shivraj Singh Chauhan participated in a programme in Lucknow to promote natural farming. They discussed spreading awareness about natural farming and announced an upcoming state-level workshop that will gather scientists, farmers, and agricultural leaders. [Devdiscourse News Desk](/devdiscourse-stories)| Updated: 19-07-2024 13:06 IST | Created: 19-07-2024 13:06 IST - Country: - India Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath and Union Minister of Agriculture, Farmers Welfare, and Rural Development Shivraj Singh Chauhan joined forces to promote natural farming in a programme held on Friday in Lucknow. The Chief Minister emphasized efforts to inform the public and farmers about the certification process for natural farming products. 'We are leveraging agricultural institutions and Mandis to disseminate information on the certification process for natural farming products,' Adityanath stated. 'Instructions have been given to all six agricultural universities to enhance their certification labs,' he added. Union Minister Chauhan highlighted that promoting natural farming is a key objective of Prime Minister Narendra Modi, noting that an awareness campaign targeting farmers will soon be launched. Additionally, UP Agriculture Minister Surya Pratap Shahi announced a state-level natural farming workshop slated for July 20 at Acharya Narendra Dev Kumarganj University in Ayodhya, featuring experts, nodal officers, and farmers. (With inputs from agencies.)
